snippet: A huge explosion at a training camp for Hamas militants in northern Gaza wounded more than 60 people, including women and children, on Thursday night.
abstract: More than 60 people are injured in Gaza in explosion at training camp for Hamas militants.
lead_paragraph: A huge explosion at a training camp for Hamas militants in northern Gaza wounded more than 60 people, including women and children, on Thursday night.

headline.main: Gaza: Dozens Injured at Hamas Camp
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Gaza: Dozens Injured at Hamas Camp
